meanings.definition: A period of instruction given by a tutor to an individual or small group.
meanings.sent1: During the tutorial, the teacher explained the math problem step by step.
meanings.sent2: I found a helpful tutorial online to learn how to play the guitar.
meanings.sent3: The tutorial on baking cookies made me laugh because the chef accidentally used salt instead of sugar.
meanings.sent4: Her tutorial on painting was like a beacon of light in the world of art.
meanings.sent5: The tutorial on gardening was so clear that I could almost smell the flowers as I read it.

meanings.sent4: Her tutorial on cooking was a treasure trove of delicious recipes.
